title: Current General Activity, Perceptions of Respondents for the Region; Percent of Respondents Reporting No Change for Federal Reserve District 3: Philadelphia
notes: Current General Activity, Perceptions of Respondents for the Region reports the change in general business activity of the region based on perceptions of respondents compared to the previous month for reporting service firms. The General Business Activity is the broadest measure of the Nonmanufacturing Business Outlook Survey. For more information about this release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, visit here. (https://www.philadelphiafed.org/research-and-data/regional-economy/nonmanufacturing-business-outlook-survey/)
